ygData.subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City
ygData.msgSnippet: Over a crater filled battlefield, firefights burst out everywhere. On the ground, under a torrent of water, kneels one of the most famous cybertronions ever,

Subject: Re: Fighting at Maxi City

Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Over a crater filled battlefield, firefights burst out everywhere. On
the ground, under a torrent of water, kneels one of the most famous
cybertronions ever, Megatron, who is being hunt down by a strange
transmetal monster. Smoke rises from his chasi, as the Decepticon leader
begins to finally stir, then from under the wet metal, two violent red
eyes begin to glow, as in a swift movement, the Decepticon leader dives
in front of two missiles, then swiftly rolls towards Prowl, as he opens
his mouth to let loose a hideous shriek. He outstreches both hands,
aiming for Prowl's body, to attempt to grapple the strange Maximal, with
iron fingers, capable of bending steel girders without thought.
